												Well, I'm a huge speedway fan. I've met with Greg Hancock in person three times, with the whole USA Team two times including Billy Hamill and Sam Ermolenko. I also had the pleasure to meet with Nicki Pedersen, Jason Crump, Hans Andersen, Martin Smolinski and many great riders from Poland to the Czech Republic, from Germany to Hungary, from Croatia to Denmark. I have a wall at home dedicated to this sport and jeez, my window looks to the Speedway Arena of Miskolc. So yes, I know a bit about this sport.I play with speedway games since Extreme Speedway Challange which came out before the first official FIM Speedway Grand Prix 1 in 2000. I prayed many times that someday there will be a great and enjoyable speedway game out there. And here it is, the FIM Speedway Grand Prix 15 is far the best game in this genre and a must have for all speedway fans. To be honest Speedway Liga was great too but the riding experience is far the best in this new game.The only thing I miss is a career mode where you can have you own driver and bike. The best would be if they can implement some leagues and SEC or SWC too but I know this isn't so easy because of the licensing issues.Nevertheless hats down to Softplanet, they created the best speedway game which is a true rival for MXGP and other motorsport games. Well done, good job! And never forget while you play, no brakes, no gears, no fear! ;-)
